ohu lakunu 12k ma laba gaththe hathare paharawalini.mahela jayawardhana ha chamara silwa shri lanka inime palamu oowara 25 awasan wana wita mulu lakunu sankhyawa 137 dakwa ihala nanwa thibu athara jayagrahanaya sandaha thawath awashyawa thibune lakunu 75k pamani. 27 wani oowarayedi sewiyar dohartige panduwakata ‘dip skuweyar leg’hi pandu rakimin siti jon hastings athata uda panduwak demin silwa dawi yamath samaga ohu ha jayawardhana athara godanagemin thibu agana kadulu sabandathawa awasan wiya.silwa dawi yamen pasuwa anjalo mathiws pitiyata piwisa jayawardhana ha ekwimath samaga ma warshawa ada halima nisa tharagaya ana hitini.

polonnaruwa shrilanipa disthrik karyalayata prahara ella kale salasum sahagathawayi amathi maithripala sirisena karunarathna gamage, sujith karunathilaka eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaye polonnaruwa disthrik karyalayata marayan sidu kala paharadima salasum sahagathawa sidu kala ekak bawa shri lanka nidahas pakshaye maha lekam, krushikarma ha gowijana sewa amathi maithripala sirisena mahatha prakasha kaleya.
